entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain and ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain or rain late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow at times heavy in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
